dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3619306X] Claiming Intellectual Rights Infridgement by Your Clients
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 25, 2007 9:31 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3619306X] Claiming Intellectual Rights
Infridgement by Your Clients (second time)

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Claiming Intellectual Rights Infridgement by Your Clients (second
time)

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Madam/Sir,  
 
We detected on the second time illegal use of our software product,
WSCraft content management system, by one of your clients on
http://www.hsantamonica.com.br  (IP: 67.15.12.81). He is using WSCraft
to manage his Website. 
 
This client is not a registered holder of the WSCraft license. He stole
this software from our server and changed names of our original php
files.  
 
Client details: 
Fabio Marchi ( http://www.marchimedia.com.br/ ) 
marchimedia@hotmail.com   
fabio@marchimedia.com.br 
 
The site is located at http://www.hsantamonica.com.br  
 
As mr. Marchi violates both your terms of service and international laws
on copyright, we demand to initiate investigation on this issue and
delete all the WSCraft CMS files from the account of this client.  We
are ready to provide you with all necessary evidences.  
 
This is also the matter of your professional reliability to not provide
technological support to those users who ignore laws and infridge
intellectual rights.  
 
I will highly appreciate if you keep me informed about results of your
investigation. 
 
Johnattan Steiner 
WSCraft Legal Department 
http://www.wscraft.com 
+972 8 931 9357  
MIME element (text/html)
